House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03162
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR EMERGENCY POWERS TO THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ADDRESS THE TRANSPORTATION CRISIS IN METRO MANILA
SHORT TITLE : The Traffic Crisis Act Of Metro Manila 2016
ABSTRACT : Grants emergency powers to the President of the Republic of the Philippines, giving him the authority to formulate and immediately implement, without hindrance and at shortest possible time, long-term solutions and remedial measures in solving the traffic problem that greatly impedes economic growth and makes life harder for the working class Filipino.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAMBUNTING, GUS S.

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
